title: High Pressure Jet Washer DJ-200
description: If cleaning becomes too difficult when the need for cleaning is urgent, or when the cleaning gets too intense, the DJ-200 comes in. This diesel-powered high-pressure jet cleaner offers pure power and industrial performance whenever you require it, equipped with 170 bar of pressure and a 17 L/min flow speed and an integrated 200-liter reservoir of water, and a 200-liter water tank all in one rugged, mobile unit.Created to be completely independent of the power grid or water lines The DJ-200 is the ideal cleaning solution for jobsites that are remote sites, construction zones big equipment warehouses, as well as farms. Simply fuel it up and blast away -it's ready to blast away mud cement, grease, oil and industrial dirt effortlessly.Whether you're washing equipment or clearing roads, or managing fleets, the DJ-200 provides the optimal combination of portability, power, and efficiency.
keyFeatures: 170-Bar High Pressure Output – Gets rid of the hardest dirt, debris, and grease with industrial-grade force.
17 L/min Water Flow – Cleans large surfaces quickly, saving time without compromising on cleanliness.
200-Liter Built-In Water Tank – Allows continuous cleaning without needing a direct water connection.
Powerful Diesel Engine – Operates anywhere, anytime without electricity—ideal for off-grid environments.
Heavy-Duty Industrial Construction – Reinforced chassis, durable wheels, and a weather-proof body built for harsh conditions.
Continuous Operation – Designed for extended run times, making it ideal for daily industrial use.
User-Friendly Design – Ergonomic controls, clear pressure gauges, and hose storage for easy operation and maintenance.
All-Terrain Cleaning Capability – Perfect for construction zones, transport hubs, farms, and remote sites requiring rugged independence.
